about.title: About Me
about.bio_p1: I hold a B.Sc. in Computer Science from UESC (GPA 8.3/10). Currently, I focus my career on developing robust Blockchain and Back-end solutions, emphasizing scalable and secure architectures.
about.bio_p2: I believe a strong technical foundation is essential for solving real problems. Therefore, I focus on deep understanding of hybrid systems (on-chain/off-chain) and applying AI for process optimization and technical automation.
about.spec1_desc: Implementing hybrid architectures and smart contracts on Polygon L2 to ensure data immutability.
about.spec2_desc: Building scalable RESTful APIs using Python (Django/FastAPI) and Node.js with a focus on performance.
about.spec3_desc: Developing modern interfaces with Vue.js integrated into containerized systems using Docker.
about.spec4_desc: Using LLMs and Prompt Engineering for code optimization, documentation, and process automation.

research.project_tcc_title: Final Project: Animal Traceability with Blockchain
research.project_tcc_desc: Full-stack platform architecture to solve agribusiness fraud through immutable traceability. Implementation of a hybrid architecture (on-chain/off-chain) recording event hashes on the Polygon network (L2) and developing a back-end custodial wallet to abstract Web3 complexity.
research.project1_desc: Development of a Python system for 3D image capture using Intel RealSense sensors and complex metadata storage. The solution automated data collection for future regression models.
research.project2_desc: Creation of a Python desktop application for automating national nutritional formulas. Rigorous application of OOP concepts and numerical processing with NumPy.
